title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-4.5 - Monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 672-4.5 - Monitoring

State Regulations

The agency reservoir releases manager shall be
responsible for monitoring the amount of water stored in the Toronto reservoir
and Cliff Lake, and for notifying the department reservoir releases manager at
least 24 hours prior to an anticipated spill from Cliff Lake and at least 24
hours prior to the time at which the water level at the Toronto reservoir is
estimated to reach 1170 feet mean sea level. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
672-4.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
